title: Kubernetes Security Checklist
description: Essential security checklist for Kubernetes clusters to ensure production readiness.

items.title: Enable RBAC
items.description: Enable Role-Based Access Control to manage permissions

items.title: Configure network policies
items.description: Define NetworkPolicy resources to control pod-to-pod communication

items.title: Use Pod Security Standards
items.description: Implement Pod Security Admission or Pod Security Policies

items.title: Enable audit logging
items.description: Configure audit policies to track all API server activity

items.title: Scan container images for vulnerabilities
items.description: Use tools like Trivy, Clair, or Snyk to scan images

items.title: Configure resource limits
items.description: Set CPU and memory limits for all containers

items.title: Use secrets management
items.description: Never store secrets in plain text, use Kubernetes Secrets or external vaults

items.title: Enable TLS for all endpoints
items.description: Ensure all communication is encrypted using TLS

items.title: Regular security updates
items.description: Keep Kubernetes and all components up to date with latest patches
